titulo: La Primera Luna Llena de Gatita [Kitten's First Full Moon]
descripcion:
El libro de imágenes más vendido a nivel nacional acerca de un gatito, la luna, y un tazón de leche, escrita por el célebre autor Kevin Henkes, fue galardonado con la Medalla Caldecott.
[What a night! The moon is full. Kitten is hungry, and inquisitive, and brave, and fast, and persistent, and unlucky...then lucky!]
Please note: This audiobook is in Spanish. This high-quality Spanish-language audiobook can be enjoyed by fluent Spanish speakers as well as those learning the language, whether at home or in a classroom.
